image.title: Michael Vassalos' Research Interest Include Farm/Agribusiness Management and Production Economics.

item.title: Michael Vassalos
item.description: Michael Vassalos is a associate professor of agricultural economics at Clemson University. His research interests interests lie primarily in the areas of farm/agribusiness management and production economics. Specifically, he is particularly interest in applied oriented economic research focusing on several aspects of farm decision making and the influence of risk on growers’ choices.
